product.name: e.l.f. Gotta Glow Lip Tint
product.description: This innovative e.l.f. Gotta Glow Lip Tint reacts with the chemistry of your lips to deliver a personalized, perfect shade of pink, berry. or peach! The ethereal hue gives a sheer flush of colour that enhances the natural beauty of your lips. The gel-based formula glides on smoothly and is infused with Shea Butter to moisturize and nourish. How To Use: Apply alone for a natural-looking wash of colour or as a base to any of your favorite e.l.f. lip colours. Repeat application as often as desired.Beauty Tip: Create a flushed glow on the check by applying a little directly to the cheeks and blend out with fingers or a sponge. Ingredients: Octyldodecanol, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Isononyl Isononanoate, Polyethylene, Dipentaerythrityl Hexahydroxystearate, Triisodecyl Trimellitate, Diisostearylmalate, Stearyl Dimethicone, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelila) Wax, Synthetic Beeswax, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Stearic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Tocopheryl Acetate (Ve), Ethylhexylglycerin, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl, Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Propylparaben. MAY CONTAIN: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891),Red 6 Lake (CI 15850), Red 27 Lake (CI 45410), Red 21 Lake (CI 45380).
